meanings.definition: A member of certain peoples of very short stature in equatorial Africa.
meanings.sent1: The pygmies in Africa are known for their small stature.
meanings.sent2: The explorer learned about the pygmies living in the dense forests of Africa.
meanings.sent3: The pygmies decided to play a prank on their tall friends by hiding in the bushes.
meanings.sent4: In the land of giants, the pygmies stood out like tiny stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pygmies dancing around the fire was etched in his memory forever.

meanings.definition: A person of small importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: Although he was just a pygmy in the company, his ideas were always valued.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a pygmy among the successful entrepreneurs at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The pygmy of the group surprised everyone with his insightful comments.
meanings.sent4: In the grand scheme of things, he was merely a pygmy in the vast ocean of talent.
meanings.sent5: His presence may be small, but his impact is as mighty as a giant's.
